<static> orgs.addTeamMember(msg, callback)

Parameters:
Name Type Description
msg Object

Object that contains the parameters and their values to be sent to the server.

Properties
Name Type Argument Description
headers Object <optional>

Key/ value pair of request headers to pass along with the HTTP request. Valid headers are: If-Modified-Since, If-None-Match, Cookie, User-Agent
id String
user String
callback function

function to call when the request is finished with an error as first argument and result data as second argument.

<static> orgs.createTeam(msg, callback)

Parameters:
Name Type Description
msg Object

Object that contains the parameters and their values to be sent to the server.

Properties
Name Type Argument Description
headers Object <optional>

Key/ value pair of request headers to pass along with the HTTP request. Valid headers are: If-Modified-Since, If-None-Match, Cookie, User-Agent
org String
name String
repo_names Array <optional>

Optional array of strings
permission String <optional>

pull - team members can pull, but not push or administer this repositories (Default), push - team members can pull and push, but not administer this repositores, admin - team members can pull, push and administer these repositories. Validation rule: ^(pull|push|admin)$.
callback function

function to call when the request is finished with an error as first argument and result data as second argument.
Source:
  • api/orgs.js, line 308
Tutorials:
  • orgs.createTeam

<static> orgs.get(msg, callback)

Parameters:
Name Type Description
msg Object

Object that contains the parameters and their values to be sent to the server.

Properties
Name Type Argument Description
headers Object <optional>

Key/ value pair of request headers to pass along with the HTTP request. Valid headers are: If-Modified-Since, If-None-Match, Cookie, User-Agent
org String
page Number <optional>

Page number of the results to fetch. Validation rule: ^[0-9]+$.
per_page Number <optional>

A custom page size up to 100. Default is 30. Validation rule: ^[0-9]+$.
callback function

function to call when the request is finished with an error as first argument and result data as second argument.
Source:
  • api/orgs.js, line 84

<static> orgs.update(msg, callback)

Parameters:
Name Type Description
msg Object

Object that contains the parameters and their values to be sent to the server.

Properties
Name Type Argument Description
headers Object <optional>

Key/ value pair of request headers to pass along with the HTTP request. Valid headers are: If-Modified-Since, If-None-Match, Cookie, User-Agent
org String
billing_email String <optional>

Optional string - Billing email address. This address is not publicized.
company String <optional>
email String <optional>

Optional string - Publicly visible email address.
location String <optional>
name String <optional>
callback function

function to call when the request is finished with an error as first argument and result data as second argument.
